attributes.action: Tp Stop the Blatant Abuse of Power in Favour of Industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The seemly constant abuse of the Governments power doing what they want, which may be miss guided by advisors (to there own ends), regardless  of the wishes of the public which is affected by its misguided  actions and conclusions.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
